TITLE: Morphing DOM with HTML String in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: Shows how to morph a DOM element using an HTML string as the target, updating both class name and inner content. SOURCE: https://github.com/patrick-steele-idem/morphdom/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` var morphdom = require('morphdom'); var el1 = document.createElement('div'); el1.className = 'foo'; el1.innerHTML = 'Hello John'; morphdom(el1, '
Hello Frank
'); expect(el1.className).to.equal('bar'); expect(el1.innerHTML).to.equal('Hello Frank'); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic Usage Example with DOM Elements in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to morph one DOM element into another using the morphdom function, showing the transformation of class names between elements. SOURCE: https://github.com/patrick-steele-idem/morphdom/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` var morphdom = require('morphdom'); var el1 = document.createElement('div'); el1.className = 'foo'; var el2 = document.createElement('div'); el2.className = 'bar'; morphdom(el1, el2); expect(el1.className).to.equal('bar'); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Advanced morphdom Usage with Options in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: Comprehensive example showing all available options that can be passed to the morphdom function to customize the DOM transformation process. SOURCE: https://github.com/patrick-steele-idem/morphdom/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` var morphdom = require('morphdom'); var morphedNode = morphdom(fromNode, toNode, { getNodeKey: function(node) { return node.id; }, addChild: function(parentNode, childNode) { parentNode.appendChild(childNode); }, onBeforeNodeAdded: function(node) { return node; }, onNodeAdded: function(node) { }, onBeforeElUpdated: function(fromEl, toEl) { return true; }, onElUpdated: function(el) { }, onBeforeNodeDiscarded: function(node) { return true; }, onNodeDiscarded: function(node) { }, onBeforeElChildrenUpdated: function(fromEl, toEl) { return true; }, childrenOnly: false, skipFromChildren: function(fromEl, toEl) { return false; } }); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Performance Optimization with isEqualNode in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates a performance optimization technique for morphdom by using isEqualNode to skip processing of equal subtrees. SOURCE: https://github.com/patrick-steele-idem/morphdom/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` morphdom(fromNode, toNode, { onBeforeElUpdated: function(fromEl, toEl) { // spec - https://dom.spec.whatwg.org/#concept-node-equals if (fromEl.isEqualNode(toEl)) { return false } return true } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Listing Required Virtual DOM API in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This code snippet lists the minimal DOM API that virtual DOM nodes are expected to implement for compatibility with morphdom. It includes methods and properties such as firstChild, nextSibling, nodeType, and others. SOURCE: https://github.com/patrick-steele-idem/morphdom/blob/master/docs/virtual-dom.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` - `node.firstChild` - `node.nextSibling` - `node.nodeType` - `node.nodeName` - `node.namespaceURI` - `node.nodeValue` - `node.attributes` - `node.value` - `node.selected` - `node.disabled` - `node.hasAttributeNS(namespaceURI, name)` - `node.actualize(document)` [1] - `node.isSameNode(anotherNode)` [2] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing morphdom via npm DESCRIPTION: Command to install the morphdom package using npm package manager. SOURCE: https://github.com/patrick-steele-idem/morphdom/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm install morphdom --save ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Morphdom Changelog in Markdown DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive changelog documenting version history, bug fixes, enhancements and breaking changes for the Morphdom library from version 1.0.1 through 2.7.5. SOURCE: https://github.com/patrick-steele-idem/morphdom/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` Changelog ========= # 2.x ## 2.7.5 - Fix issue where empty optgroup in select prevents proper diffing ## 2.7.4 - Fix incorrect index references when returning a cloned tree from onBeforeElUpdated ## 2.7.3 - Allow returning a new fromEl tree from onBeforeElUpdated to be used morph for that branch ## 2.7.2 - Fix morphing duplicate ids of incompatible tags ## 2.7.1 - Pass toEl as second argument to `skipFromChildren` callback ## 2.7.0 - Add new `addChild` and `skipFromChildren` callbacks to allow customization of how new children are added to a parent as well as preserving the from tree when indexing changes for diffing. ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying HTML Performance Benchmark Results for Morphdom vs Virtual-DOM DESCRIPTION: HTML markup that displays performance benchmark results comparing morphdom and virtual-dom libraries. The content includes a summary of total execution times and a detailed table showing individual test case performance in milliseconds. SOURCE: https://github.com/patrick-steele-idem/morphdom/blob/master/docs/old-benchmark.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running morphdom benchmarks with npm DESCRIPTION: Command to run benchmarks for morphdom, which will generate a test-page.html file with benchmark results. SOURCE: https://github.com/patrick-steele-idem/morphdom/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm run benchmark ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running morphdom tests DESCRIPTION: Command to run the test suite for morphdom to ensure all functionality works correctly. This is recommended before submitting pull requests. SOURCE: https://github.com/patrick-steele-idem/morphdom/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm test ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Morphdom Examples Repository DESCRIPTION: Commands to clone the morphdom repository from GitHub and install its dependencies using npm. SOURCE: https://github.com/patrick-steele-idem/morphdom/blob/master/examples/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` git clone https://github.com/patrick-steele-idem/morphdom cd morphdom npm install ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Morphdom Examples Server DESCRIPTION: Command to start the examples server which hosts the morphdom demos. SOURCE: https://github.com/patrick-steele-idem/morphdom/blob/master/examples/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` node examples/server.js ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Opening generated benchmark results in browser DESCRIPTION: Command to open the generated benchmark results file in a browser. The file path needs to be adjusted to the specific installation location. SOURCE: https://github.com/patrick-steele-idem/morphdom/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` file:///HOME/path-to-morphdom/test/mocha-headless/generated/test-page.html ```
